title: My Regular Customer Only Wants One Thing
itunes:title: My Regular Customer Only Wants One Thing

description:
Mind the regulars...

***

Written by MikeJesus and narrated by Mike Dent

***

Check out our reward tiers at patreon.com/creepypod

***

You can also subscribe to us on YouTube:

https://www.youtube.com/creepypod

***

Produced by Steve Blizin

***

Title music by Alex Aldea

***

Intro/Outro Narration by Joe Stofko


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
